QuestData.Title: Penetrating Their Defenses
QuestData.Description: Here we go, $n!$b$bJust beyond that door lies the control room.$b$bI'll just run in, disable the reorigination mechanism, and then we all go home. Nice an' easy.$b$bYe see, $glad:lass;, it's this level of preparation that separates yer true archaeologist from yer average treasure hunter.$b$bNo sense in stirring up the beasties if ye don't have to. Just makes a mess a' things...
QuestData.LogDescription: Gain entry to the Titan Control Room.
QuestData.RewardText: Well, I've got bad news and I've got...$b$bNo, scratch that. There only be bad news.
